TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ExtendedProtectionPolicy extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 类表示服务器用来验证传入客户端连接的扩展保护策略。

span.span: The class represents the extended protection policy used by the server to validate incoming client connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开的任何类类不应允许 null 策略的设置、 应提供一个默认策略，或应要求以创建和设置由应用程序开发人员或管理员的显式策略。Any classes that expose the class should not allow the setting of null policies, should supply a default policy, or should require an explicit policy to be created and set by the application developer or administrator.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CustomChannelBinding As ChannelBinding

summary.span: 获取用于验证的自定义通道绑定令牌 (CBT)。

span.span: Gets a custom channel binding token (CBT) to use for validation.

value.span: ，它包含用于验证的自定义通道绑定。

span.span: A that contains a custom channel binding to use for validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此只读属性表示要用于验证的自定义通道绑定令牌。This read-only property represents a custom channel binding token to use for validation. 这是 CBT 提供的自定义的外部通道时，在高级方案中使用。This is used in advanced scenarios when the CBT is provided by a custom outer channel. 一个示例方案，可能将此属性与结合和。An example scenario might use this property in combination with and .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CustomServiceNames As ServiceNameCollection

summary.span: 获取用于与客户端的 SPN 相匹配的自定义服务提供程序名称 (SPN) 列表。

span.span: Gets the custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list used to match against a client's SPN.

value.span: 包含用于与客户端的 SPN 相匹配的自定义 SPN 列表。

span.span: A that contains the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此只读属性指示用于与客户端的 spn 相匹配的自定义 SPN 列表。This read-only property indicates the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN. 默认情况下，服务器将确定根据其已注册的终结点的默认 SPN 列表。By default, the server will determine a default SPN list according to its registered endpoints. 对于需要 SPN 检查的方案，可以使用使用某个构造函数重写用于与客户端的 spn 相匹配的默认列表指定此属性。For scenarios which require SPN checking, this property can be specified using a using a constructor to override the default list used to match against the client’s SPN.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property OSSupportsExtendedProtection As Boolean
public: static property bool OSSupportsExtendedProtection { bool get(); };

summary.span: 指示操作系统是否支持带扩展保护的集成 Windows 身份验证。

span.span: Indicates whether the operating system supports integrated windows authentication with extended protection.

value.span: 如果操作系统支持带扩展保护的集成 Windows 身份验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operating system supports integrated windows authentication with extended protection, otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改后，才能支持扩展的保护是当前适用于 Windows 7 和 Windows Server 2008 R2 上的应用程序。The changes to support extended protection are currently available for applications on Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2. 扩展的保护功能将可作为更新为 Windows Vista 和 Windows Server 2008。The extended protection features will be made available as updates for Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008. 扩展保护功能不可用于 Windows 的早期版本。The extended protection features are not available on earlier versions of Windows.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PolicyEnforcement As PolicyEnforcement

value.span: 值，该值指示应何时强制实施扩展保护策略。

span.span: A value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此只读属性指示 （往常一样，如果支持的客户端，或从不） 应何时强制扩展的保护策略。This read-only property indicates when extended protection policy should be enforced (always, when supported by clients, or never).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此只读属性指示此策略强制实施保护的类型。This read-only property indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
